features: TONER FOR SKIN PROTECTION - Formulated with the key ingredients of TECA (titrated extract of centella asiatica) and centella asiatica, with additional beneficial ingredients of allantoin, feverfew and bergamot leaf, the Relief Toner helps protect your skin and restore skin's natural balance, leaving it feeling comfortable, supple, and revitalized.

CALMING & SOOTHING EFFECT - Choosing the right toner marks a great start to your daily skincare routine by setting a solid and well-hydrated foundation as a base for rest of your skincare. Relief Toner is an ideal toner for calming and soothing your irritated and sensitized skin!

FREE FROM HARMFUL CHEMICALS - Centellian 24 uses only highest quality and natural ingredients in its products. This toner is a perfect hypoallergenic and gentle product choice for those who suffer from dry and sensitive skin. Use along with the Relief Essence, Relief Lotion, and Relief Cream for best results.

ABOUT CENTELLIAN 24 - Centellian 24 is a derma-cosmetic brand that offers innovative and effective everyday skincare solutions based on Dongkook Pharmaceutical's skin science technology developed for over half a century; since 1968. We leverage the healing power of centella asiatica and our expertise in skin science to develop products to repair your skin and keep your skin healthy and youthful for 24 hours at a time.

ABOUT DONGKOOK - Dongkook Pharmaceutical is a leading healthcare group based in South Korea with over 50 years of expertise in Centella Asiatica for OTC uses, after years of research and reformulations brought the best-selling product Medacasol to the Korean public and made its name known in every household. With their expertise in healing ointments, Dongkook has branched out into the skincare industry to bring innovative solutions for sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Relief Toner Toning Essence Treatment Homme Soothing Toner Soothing Mist PHA Cleansing Pad Category Facial Toners & Astringents Facial Toners & Astringents Facial Toners & Astringents Facial Mists Facial Cleansing Washes Key Ingredients Centella asiatica 82%, TECA (100 ppm), niacinamide, allantoin Centella asiatica 86%, TECA (10 ppm), niacinamide Blue Madeca 92.67 % with centella asiatica, TECA, blue chamomile Centella asiatica 86%, TECA, panthenol, eucalyptus, green tea TECA, PHA (gluconolactone) 5,000 ppm, centella asiatica extract 89% Formula Lightweight Highly concentrated & dense Lightweight Lightweight Pre-soaked cotton pads Benefits Soothes/relieves & protects Illuminates/clarifies complexion, hydrates & nourishes Controls sebum/oil, soothes & hydrates Soothes, protects & hydrates Moisturizes & gently removes dead skin cells Recommended Use For irritated & sensitized skin For uneven skin tone & aging skin For men's skin For irritated & sensitized skin For rough skin, clogged pores When to Use After cleansing After cleansing After cleansing Throughout the day as needed For makeup removal & cleansing Volume 300 ml/10.14 fl oz 300 ml/10.14 fl oz 150 ml/5.07 fl oz 100 ml/3.38 fl oz 60 count Skin type All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and shine my face
reviews.reviewText: I stop using my old skin lotion even though I paid way more money than this product.But guess what for some reason I keep picking up this product. I am sure there is reasons for me to do that.When you put it on your face, it feels so soft , smooth, and very light pleasant smell, which I really love.Then you can tell by looking your face skin looks very calm and shiny.I really recommend to everyone who is looking for a gentle product for your face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soothing & moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: This is the best toner so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a perfect product for soothing
reviews.reviewText: This product was genuinely perfect for calming and soothing irritated skin. After using it acne on my face were starting to disappear and the redness went better. Also, it feels like the wrinkle has been gone a little bit after a few days.I do recommend it for someone who is looking for a toner product to sooth and calm your skin problems. I will definitely rebuy this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: With this toner, I don't seem to wipe off as much residue that cleansers seem t miss, but I do love it actually feels moisturizing compared to all toners I've ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I tried this product and my skin was red in seconds. I don’t have too sensitive skin, I’m just sensitive to chemicals, so I would not recommend this product for those who have sensitive skin, it burnt my skin and it took few days for me to recover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The scent is really good and also the skin is easily absorb on my skin. Feels like my skin is getting glare after using this skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great skin care product
reviews.reviewText: Great skin care product for oily face!It makes skin balance very well and has fresh light texture. Would love to buy another one after using all of it.
